name: HELITEC PTY LTD
about: Helitec Pty Ltd, located at the Sunshine Coast Airport in Queensland, Australia, is a premier flight training institution specializing in helicopter aviation. Approved by the Civil Aviation Safety Authority (CASA) for both non-integrated Part 141 and integrated Part 142 flight training, Helitec offers a range of courses, including the Diploma of Aviation – Commercial Pilot Licence (Helicopter) and instrument training to international ICAO standards. The school operates modern helicopters and utilizes a CASA-approved Airbus flight simulator. Helitec also provides scenic flights, aerial photography, and trial instruction flights. With experienced instructors and state-of-the-art facilities, Helitec is an ideal choice for aspiring helicopter pilots. Helitec is committed to delivering high-quality aviation training in one of Australia's most scenic flying regions.
